ARABIC: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًا مِّن طِينٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Your Lord said to the angels, 'I am going to create a human being out of clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When your Lord said to the angels: "I am going to create a man from clay;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: When your Lord said to the angels: “Verily I am creating a human being from clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When your Lord told the angels, "I will create a mortal out of clay,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: (Remember) When your Lord said to the angels, “I will create a human from clay.” –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Remember) when your Lord said to the angels: "Truly, I am going to create man from clay."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When your Lord said to the angels; Surely I am going to create a mortal from dust:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When thy Lord said to the angels, 'See, I am creating a mortal of a clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When thy Lord said unto the angels: Lo! I am about to create a mortal out of mire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Your Lord said to the angels, "I am about to create a human being out of clay;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Recall what time thy Lord said Unto the angels: verily I am about to create a human being from clay;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When your Lord said to the angels, ‘Indeed I am about to create a human being out of clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold, thy Lord said to the angels: "I am about to create man from clay:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Remember) when your Lord said to the angels: "Truly, I am going to create man from clay".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When your Lord said to the angels: 'I am creating a human from clay,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Your Lord said to the angels, “I am creating a human being from clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [So mention] when your Lord said to the angels, "Indeed, I am going to create a human being from clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:71] Mention, when your Lord said to the angels, ‘Indeed I am about to create a human being out of clay, and this was Adam.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then Allah explained the argument of the angels, saying: mention to them, Muhammad (When thy Lord said unto the angels: lo! I am about to create a mortal out of mire) i.e. Adam, 527
